name: Omniscient Immortal Cultivator
author: Youshi Culture
content: The mighty cultivator transcended the boundaries of supernatural realms and, in order to fulfill their long-standing aspiration of ascension, decided to embark on a journey of reincarnation in a parallel world. With their innate talent for the Dao and the remnants of cultivation, this world has not been devoid of cultivators. It has merely been awaiting the reawakening of the era of cultivation!
